name: T-Regg
description:
Chicken are the new dinossaurs. Dinossaurs are now angry - they're planning an attack. Defend your nest against evil incarnate!

A simple tower defense prototype for GDS GameJam #3  - "Unconventional Weapon". Shoot 'em up!

Programming: 
Bruno Brixius
Camila Primieri @cprimieri
Carolina Lange Mello

Art:
